input.sentences: your father in the passenger seat ask if you have enough for the cab fare .
a tourist riding in a care snaps a picture of the local area .
the people at the meeting are taking a test .
after nailing the interview you decide to treat yourself at a local diner .
your friend joe decides to join you after you nailed the interview .
output.sentences: Driving through London was a treat with father as a passenger in our car.
Father described everything with flair, here he talked about the tourists in town like he knew them.
We were hungry and wanted to stop for some local fair, father jokingly led us to a testing site for residents.
Feeling  a little akward now, because of the test site issue, father led us to a local restaurant. A very nice local restaurant.
While enjoying our dinner, Joe, a friend of father's joined us for dessert.
